description: Easy to use. Very useful. Excellent layout & menus.
They take a different approach. It's packed with features. But the UI isn't neat enough.

Am I the only one using Tea?

Customise the GUI and it no longer looks like a childrens App.

It's one of the few Text Editors I've found that will clean up unwanted formatting, tabs and spaces from text copied from Web Pages in a single button press. Select the Text and then 'Text Functions' then 'Remove Formatting at each line'.

The only other two Apps I use for that are Notepad2 on Windows and the excellent Clean Text on Mac.

I nead Tea!

Sous une interface qui n'est déroutante que très peu de temps, on trouve un éditeur excellent et de nombreuses possibilités (dont la sympathique possibilité de ne pas se voir proposer l'enregistrement par défaut systématiquement dans le dossier personnel)*
